Service Details: - Provides a safe and convenient alternative to Driving Under the Influence (DUI)- Offers a  professional driving service that will pick you and your vehicle up after you have had a few drinks and get you safely home- Offers the convenience of a taxi in the comfort of your own vehicle without sacrificing safety in getting home
